subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Brook Lopez scored a season-high 32 points and the Nets ended a three-game losing streak with a 106-99 overtime victory over the slumping Atlanta Hawks on Tuesday night in Newark.
snippet: Brook Lopez scored a season-high 32 points and the Nets ended a three-game losing streak with a 106-99 overtime victory over the slumping Atlanta Hawks on Tuesday night in Newark.
